entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 07:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
